text: "Why Don't They Understand" is a song written by Jack Fishman and Joe Henderson and performed by George Hamilton IV. It reached #10 on the U.S. pop chart and #22 on the UK Singles Chart in 1958. The single was arranged by Don Costa. ==Other charting versions== *Bobby Vinton released a version which reached #23 on the adult contemporary chart and #109 on the U.S. pop chart in 1970. ==Other versions== *Glen Mason released a version of the song as the B-side to his 1957 single "Crying My Heart Out for You". *Victor Silvester and His Ballroom Orchestra released a version of the song as the B-side to their 1958 single "The Story of My Life". *Lem Winchester released a version of the song on his 1960 album With Feeling. *The Anita Kerr Singers released a version of the song on their 1963 album Tender Words. It was produced by Chet Atkins. *Wink Martindale released a version of the song as the B-side to his 1964 single "Big Buildin'". *Dave Berry released a version of the song on his 1965 EP Can I Get It from You. *Petula Clark released a version of the song on her 1965 album The World's Greatest International Hits! It was produced by Tony Hatch. *Cliff Richard released a version of the song on his 1965 EP Why Don't They Understand. *Patty Duke released a version of the song on her 1966 album Patty Duke's Greatest Hits. *Don Spencer released a version of the song as a single in 1966, but it did not chart. *Frankie Avalon released a version of the song as the B-side to his 1969 single "For Your Love". It was produced by Jimmy Bowen. *The Williams Brothers released a version of the song on their 2002 compilation album Andy & David. ==References== Category:1957 songs Category:1957 singles Category:1966 singles Category:1970 singles Category:George Hamilton IV songs Category:Bobby Vinton songs Category:Wink Martindale songs Category:Dave Berry (musician) songs Category:Petula Clark songs Category:Cliff Richard songs Category:Frankie Avalon songs Category:Song recordings produced by Chet Atkins Category:Song recordings produced by Tony Hatch Category:Song recordings produced by Jimmy Bowen Category:ABC Records singles Category:Epic Records singles
